rr.state
Class ShadowThread

java.lang.Object
  acme.util.decorations.Decoratable
      rr.state.ShadowThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, ShadowVar
public class ShadowThread
extends Decoratable
implements ShadowVar

The shadow state for each Thread object. Tools should not access of modify the contents of a ShadowThread object. Any additional thread-specific data needed by tools should be added to ShadowThread via a decoration.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Detail

tid

protected int tid
The RoadRunner thread id of the thread, or -1 if the thread has been terminated. ReadOnly by tools.

protected final Thread thread
The Java thread object for this ShadowThread object.

parent

protected final ShadowThread parent
The ShadowThread for parent thread.

isStopped

protected final AtomicFlag isStopped
True if the thread has stopped running.

                                                            DecorationFactory.Type type,

Create a new decoration for thread states.

Type Parameters:
T - Type of decoration
Parameters:
name - Name of decoration
type - Whether two different decorations can have the same name
defaultValueMaker - The default value for the decoration
